column4: Hi I am running Gutsy Gibbon I love it, I have windows xp/vista in the restroom :D I have just very big problems with my ATI 9800XT. When I change the resolution on my fresh and clean Ubuntu OS then the screen turns black and everything freezes incl. mouse and keyboard. All I want is to make my homework on the computer at 1024x768@85Hz and run compiz. Please provide me some help..I'm lose
wish I had a tux brain, so I could help myself out of this ati misere..:(
is going to blame ati...please stop him
